com.amazon.inapp.purchasing

Class PurchaseResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.inapp.purchasing.PurchaseResponse

  • public final class PurchaseResponse
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the result of a call to PurchasingManager.initiatePurchaseRequest(String), sent to the registered PurchasingObserver asynchronously via PurchasingObserver.onPurchaseResponse(PurchaseResponse).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PurchaseResponse.PurchaseRequestStatus
      Represents the status of a purchase request initiated via PurchasingManager.initiatePurchaseRequest(String).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PurchaseResponse.PurchaseRequestStatus getPurchaseRequestStatus()
      Returns the status of the purchase request.
      Receipt getReceipt()
      Returns a Receipt if getPurchaseRequestStatus() is PurchaseResponse.PurchaseRequestStatus.SUCCESSFUL otherwise null.
      java.lang.String getRequestId()
      Returns the request ID originally returned by PurchasingManager.initiatePurchaseRequest(String).
      java.lang.String getUserId()
      Returns the ID of the user associated with the purchase.
      java.lang.String toString()

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getRequestId

        public java.lang.String getRequestId()
        Returns the request ID originally returned by PurchasingManager.initiatePurchaseRequest(String). This identifier can be used to correlate the original request with this response.
        Returns:
        The ID of the request this response is associated with

      • getUserId

        public java.lang.String getUserId()
        Returns the ID of the user associated with the purchase. This identifier is unique to this application.
        Returns:
        The ID of the user associated with the purchase

      • getReceipt

        public Receipt getReceipt()
        Returns a Receipt if getPurchaseRequestStatus() is PurchaseResponse.PurchaseRequestStatus.SUCCESSFUL otherwise null.
        Returns:
        A Receipt in the case where getPurchaseRequestStatus() returns PurchaseResponse.PurchaseRequestStatus.SUCCESSFUL, null otherwise

      • getPurchaseRequestStatus

        public PurchaseResponse.PurchaseRequestStatus getPurchaseRequestStatus()
        Returns the status of the purchase request.
        Returns:
        The status of the purchase request

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
